input.parameter: SELECT @i := @i + 1 AS number, IF(@street = v.street_name AND @house = v.house, NULL, v.street_name) AS street, IF(@street = v.street_name AND @house = v.house, NULL, v.house) AS house, v.premises_num, v.floor, v.total_area, v.living_area, v.is_commercial, v.is_special, v.is_social, v.is_other, @street := v.street_name AS street_eq, @house := v.house AS house_eq FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT vks.street_name, b.house, vpm.premises_num, vpm.floor, vpm.total_area, vpm.living_area, IF(vpcf.id_premises IS NULL, '','v') AS is_commercial, IF(vpsf.id_premises IS NULL, '','v') AS is_special, IF(vpspf.id_premises IS NULL, '','v') AS is_social, IF(vpof.id_premises IS NULL, '','v') AS is_other FROM v_premises_municipal vpm INNER JOIN buildings b ON b.id_building = vpm.id_building INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street LEFT JOIN v_premises_commercial_fund vpcf ON vpm.id_premises = vpcf.id_premises LEFT JOIN v_premises_special_fund vpsf ON vpm.id_premises = vpsf.id_premises LEFT JOIN v_premises_social_fund vpspf ON vpm.id_premises = vpspf.id_premises LEFT JOIN v_premises_other_fund vpof ON vpm.id_premises = vpof.id_premises WHERE SUBSTRING(vks.id_street, 1, 13) IN ([regions]) UNION ALL SELECT vks.street_name, b.house, CONCAT(vpm.premises_num,'(',sp.sub_premises_num,')') AS sub_premises_num, vpm.floor, sp.total_area, NULL, IF(vpcf.id_premises IS NULL, '','v') AS is_commercial, IF(vpsf.id_premises IS NULL, '','v') AS is_special, IF(vpspf.id_premises IS NULL, '','v') AS is_social, IF(vpof.id_premises IS NULL, '','v') AS is_other FROM sub_premises sp INNER JOIN v_premises_municipal vpm ON sp.id_premises = vpm.id_premises INNER JOIN buildings b ON b.id_building = vpm.id_building INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street LEFT JOIN v_sub_premises_commercial_fund vpcf ON sp.id_sub_premises = vpcf.id_sub_premises LEFT JOIN v_sub_premises_special_fund vpsf ON sp.id_sub_premises = vpsf.id_sub_premises LEFT JOIN v_sub_premises_social_fund vpspf ON sp.id_sub_premises = vpspf.id_sub_premises LEFT JOIN v_sub_premises_other_fund vpof ON sp.id_sub_premises = vpof.id_sub_premises WHERE (vpcf.id_sub_premises IS NOT NULL OR vpsf.id_sub_premises IS NOT NULL OR vpspf.id_sub_premises IS NOT NULL OR vpof.id_sub_premises IS NOT NULL) AND SUBSTRING(vks.id_street, 1, 13) IN ([regions])) v ORDER BY v.street_name, v.house) v, (SELECT @i := 0, @street := NULL, @house := NULL) vars
